title: Hubie's Haloween
details: Dude, Where's My Car? is a 2000 comedy film directed by Danny Leiner. The movie follows the misadventures of two friends, Jesse and Chester, played by Ashton Kutcher and Seann William Scott, who wake up with no memory of the previous night and must retrace their steps to find Jesse's missing car.
